about_the_game:
[WORK IN PROGRESS]

Hi! The game and demo are in active development.
The screenshots show the current state of the features.
Things are still subject to change, i.e. features can be added, removed, changed, etc...

[STORY]

Betrayed. Murdered. Rewound. Every painful death offers a chance to go back in time and rewrite your fate, but every rewind chips away at the lifeline that keeps your parents alive - your scholarship allowance. Each rewind comes with two gut-wrenching consequences:
  • Hold onto your memories but say goodbye to your coins, or
  • Lacking in coins, face a blank slate with aching void yearning for a lost love, and clues swallowed by the sands of time (game over).

Time is your enemy, your scholarship allowance your currency, and your heart the ultimate prize. Navigate a world where every path whispers promises and demands sacrifices.

Will you:
  • Seek vengeance for your betrayal?
  • Protect your parents from a fate worse than death?
  • Find true love in a web of deceit and shifting loyalties?

But each rewind resets your relationships. Every death is a gamble. Can you rewrite your fate before your coins run out and your heart pays the ultimate price?

Planned but Unconfirmed Features

  • Farming
  • Multiplayer
  • 3D Map Exploration
  • Dress Up
  • Dating Sim / Life Sim
  • Hack and Slash
  • Choose Your Own Adventure
  • Female Protagonist
  • Character Customization (with limits)
  • Pet

Game Platforms

  • Windows: This is the initial platform during the development

content_descriptors.notes:
Cartoonish violence. No blood.

Some characters with slightly revealing outfit.

Legal alcohol consumption.

name: The Unforeseen Resurrection - Otome Isekai RPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A 3D open-world farming RPG with life-sim elements and otome isekai themes. It is set in a fantastical modern world, where computer games bleed into reality and digitized beasts lurk, you wield a unique power: time travel with a hefty price tag.
